author: Jeff Geerling
description:
Wow there's a lot to cover, from the tiniest Pi computer to a full Pi AI mechanical keyboard!

Sam has listed his prototype TypeOrTalk V2 keyboard on eBay, if you want to bid on it: https://www.ebay.com/itm/267259133332

Here are _all_ the projects I covered today—the Amazon links are affiliate links:

  - Sentinel Core: https://sanctuary-systems.com/sentinel-core/
  - EDAtec ED-SBC3300: https://edatec.cn/sbc/sbc3300
  - CM5 MINIMA REV1 (source): https://github.com/piecol/CM5_MINIMA_REV1
  - CM5 MINIMA REV2 (source): https://github.com/piecol/CM5_MINIMA_REV2
  - CM5 MINIMA REV2 (buy): https://www.elecrow.com/cm5-minima-r-2.html
  - CM5 MINIMA (other variants): https://www.linkedin.com/posts/pierluigi-colangeli_minima-cm5-oshw-activity-7327603359085940736-F8av
  - CM5 MINIMA Hackster article: https://www.hackster.io/piecol/tiny-open-source-media-streamer-with-lorawan-what-a98a93
  - Waveshare CM5 Nano A: https://amzn.to/4dlJyEp
  - Waveshare CM5 Nano B: https://amzn.to/45kEa2m
  - Wave
title: Someone finally did it: A private AI Keyboard (CM5 Roundup)

author: Jeff Geerling
description:
The TypeOrTalk is a local, private, offline AI-powered keyboard that translates your speech into text. And it's a fine custom mechanical keyboard, too!

If you want to get notified of any updates, check out: https://typeortalk.com
And Sam's auctioning off a prototype on eBay! Check it out here: https://www.ebay.com/itm/267259133332

Sam paid me nothing for this video, and I'm shipping him back the keyboard now that I'm finished testing it. He and I have been talking (and typing, lol) about this project for a while, and I wanted to show off his project since I thought it was a neat idea and an inspirational project for anyone thinking a project like this is out of reach of an individual!

What do you think? Also check out the long form video going over this and a bunch of other CM5 hardware projects!

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/geerlingguy
Sponsor me on GitHub: https://github.com/sponsors/geerlingguy
Merch: https://www.redshirtjeff.com
2nd Channel: https://www.youtu
title: The AI keyboard: TypeOrTalk
